column5: On our journey north we'll be diving through Hull, Quebec between midnight and 1 am. Are the package stores still open and would we be able to stock up on some brew? Thanks in advance for any help.

Right off main you'll see the package store. They normally turn off most of the lights late (after 10 pm) but if you honk your horn about a dozen times you'll get their attention and they will take care of you. Sometimes they are in the storeroom out back so just keep honkin till they come out.
